metadata.title: Seductive Blackjack Adventure
metadata.description: A steamy casino adventure with attractive hostesses
metadata.author: Casino Story Writer

initializeAllVariables.description: Initialize all variables used in conditional templates

increaseVisitCount.description: Increase the player's visit count to the casino

beCharming.description: Set charming personality and increase charm points

successfulDate.description: Complete a successful date with a character

badImpression.description: Make a bad impression with a character

resetAllVariables.description: Reset all variables for new game

isNewbie.text: You're still learning the ropes here.

isRegular.text: You're a familiar face around here.

lovesYou.text: {character} looks at you with deep affection.

hates.text: {character} glares at you with obvious dislike.

isBroke.text: You're running dangerously low on funds.

hasModestFunds.text: You have decent funds to play with.

canAffordHighStakes.text: You have enough for high stakes play.

canAffordUltraStakes.text: You have enough for ultra high stakes.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: Initializing your casino adventure...

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You step into the casino, and immediately, you're hit with the vibrant atmosphere. The sounds of laughter, music, and chips clinking against each other fill your ears.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You look around, taking in the sights of the various slot machines, tables, and rows of people sitting at the craps table.

conditionalText.isNewbie: Everything here is new and exciting to you.
conditionalText.isRegular: The staff nods in recognition as you pass by.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You make your way through the crowd until you see a woman standing at the entrance, dressed in a tight red dress. She turns to face you, her piercing green eyes locking onto yours.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: She smirks and walks towards you, her hips swaying seductively.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: Welcome to the casino, love. I'm Victoria. I'll be your hostess for the evening.

conditionalText.isNewbie: I can tell this is your first time here.
conditionalText.isRegular: Welcome back! I was hoping you'd return.
conditionalText.isVIP: Welcome back, VIP! Your usual table is ready.

preDialog.speaker: Player
preDialog.text: Thanks, Victoria. It's nice to meet you.

conditionalText.likesYou:victoria: It's great to see you again, Victoria.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: Please, call me Vicky. Let's get you settled in at one of our blackjack tables.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: She leads you to a table where a beautiful blonde woman is dealing cards.

choices.text: Follow Victoria to the blackjack table

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: This is Rachel. She'll be dealing for you tonight.

conditionalText.likesYou:victoria: I know you two will get along well.
conditionalText.isCharming: You'll love her - she's as charming as you are.

preDialog.speaker: Rachel
preDialog.text: Hi there! Welcome to our table. Can I get you started with some chips?

conditionalText.isNewbie: Don't worry, I'll help guide you through the game.
conditionalText.isRich: I can see you're a serious player - let's get you some premium chips.
conditionalText.isRegular: Back for more action? I like that in a player.

preDialog.speaker: Player
preDialog.text: Yeah, please. And do you have any recommendations for this game?

conditionalText.isCharming: I'd love to hear your expert advice, Rachel.

preDialog.speaker: Rachel
preDialog.text: Well, the key is to keep track of your hand value. If it gets too close to 21, you might want to hit or stand.

conditionalText.likesYou:rachel: You seem like a quick learner.
conditionalText.isCharming: But I have a feeling you'll do just fine.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: And don't forget to pay attention to the dealer's up card. That can help you make better decisions.

conditionalText.likesYou:victoria: I'll be here to help if you need guidance.
conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: Though I'll be watching to help you out if you need it.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You begin playing, focusing on the game as much as possible. As you continue, you can feel a growing attraction between you and Vicky, especially when she helps you out and offers words of encouragement. You also notice that Rachel seems to be flirting with you, but you try to focus on the game.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: It's time to start playing. What stakes would you like to play?

conditionalText.isRich: With your bankroll, you can afford any table.
conditionalText.isBroke: You'll want to be careful with your limited funds.

postDialog.speaker: Narrator
postDialog.text: After an exciting game, you've won! {result}. Your current balance is now ${money}.

winCondition.additionalText: Victoria seems very impressed with your skills.

loseCondition.additionalText: Victoria gives you a sympathetic look.

postDialog.speaker: Victoria
postDialog.text: You played wonderfully! As a special reward, I'd like to offer you a private session in our VIP room. Would you like to join me?

conditionalText.likesYou:victoria: I think we could have some fun together.
conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: I've been thinking about this all evening.

preDialog.speaker: Rachel
preDialog.text: You're asking for my opinion? How thoughtful!

conditionalText.likesYou:rachel: I appreciate that you value what I think.
conditionalText.lovesYou:rachel: I think you should follow your heart.
conditionalText.isCharming: A gentleman always asks a lady's opinion.

preDialog.speaker: Rachel
preDialog.text: Actually, I think you should spend some time with me first. I promise I can show you just as good a time.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: Rachel leads you to a private dealer's room behind the main floor. The intimate space is perfect for getting to know each other better.

preDialog.speaker: Rachel
preDialog.text: I'm so glad you chose me. Victoria's nice, but I think we have a special connection.

conditionalText.lovesYou:rachel: I've been hoping you'd pick me.
conditionalText.isCharming: You have such a way about you that just draws me in.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You spend intimate time with Rachel...

preDialog.speaker: Rachel
preDialog.text: That was amazing! Now, shall we head back? I'd love to introduce you to more of the casino.

choices.text: Let's explore more of the casino

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: Both of us? That's... quite bold of you.

conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: I suppose I could consider it...
conditionalText.isCharming + isVIP: But I suppose someone of your caliber deserves special treatment.

preDialog.speaker: Rachel
preDialog.text: I'm game if you are, Victoria. He's certainly earned it.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: The three of you head to the most exclusive VIP suite in the casino. This is a night you'll never forget.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You enjoy an incredible evening with both Victoria and Rachel...

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: That was absolutely incredible! You're quite the man.

choices.text: Let's check out more of the casino

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: After winning the first game, you receive a prize: a private room where you can have an intimate encounter with Vicky. You both head into the room, and once the door closes behind you, Vicky turns to face you.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: She takes a step closer, her eyes locked onto yours.

conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: The affection in her eyes is unmistakable.
conditionalText.isCharming: Your natural charm has clearly won her over completely.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: So, how did you like the game tonight? Did you enjoy my company?

conditionalText.likesYou:victoria: I hope I made your evening special.
conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: I've been looking forward to being alone with you all evening.

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You spend some intimate time with Victoria in the VIP room...

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: Time passes...

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: That was lovely. Now, shall we head back to the casino floor? I'd like to introduce you to another table with some new faces.

conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: I hope we can do this again soon.
conditionalText.isVIP: As our VIP guest, you deserve to see everything we offer.

choices.text: Yes, let's check out the new table
I'd rather stay here a bit longer

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: Oh? You want to stay longer? I think that can be arranged...

conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: I'd love to spend more time with you too.
conditionalText.isCharming: You're quite the romantic, aren't you?

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: You spend more time with Victoria...

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: That was wonderful, but we really should join the others now. Let me introduce you to some new games and faces.

choices.text: Let's go to the new table

preDialog.speaker: Narrator
preDialog.text: Victoria takes you back to the casino floor to introduce you to the next table you can play with 2 new girls.

conditionalText.isVIP: The staff clearly recognizes your VIP status.
conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: Victoria is clearly proud to be showing off her favorite guest.

preDialog.speaker: Victoria
preDialog.text: This is our high-roller table. These ladies are Sophia and Jasmine. They'll take good care of you.

conditionalText.isVIP: He's one of our most valued guests.
conditionalText.lovesYou:victoria: He's very special to me, so treat him well.
conditionalText.isRich: He's got excellent taste and the bankroll to match.

achievements.title: Beginner's Luck
achievements.description: Win your first game of blackjack

achievements.title: High Roller
achievements.description: Play a game with stakes of $1000 or more

achievements.title: Ultra High Roller
achievements.description: Play a game with stakes of $2000 or more

achievements.title: Victoria's Heart
achievements.description: Build a special connection with Victoria

achievements.title: Rachel's Favor
achievements.description: Win over the charming dealer Rachel

achievements.title: Suite Dreams
achievements.description: Access the exclusive suite with Sophia and Jasmine

achievements.title: Triple Play
achievements.description: Convince multiple ladies to spend time together

achievements.title: True Connection
achievements.description: Find lasting love at the casino
